title: Study Assistant and Code Synchronization Platform
description: A high-performance educational platform featuring a full-completeness document ingestion pipeline, layered caching (Redis/In-memory), and a multi-step Gemini AI system for advanced note generation, context-aware chatting, and automated exam solving.

title: Travel Package Booking App
description: A high-quality mobile application utilizing Jetpack Compose and real-time data flow (Firestore Snapshot Listeners) across all features, complemented by a robust notification scheduling system (WorkManager) and an integrated AI assistant (Gemini API).

title: Online Shopping System
description: A robust Java application featuring a dedicated Service Layer for complete CRUD functionality across major entities, ensuring persistent data management via JSON serialization (Gson) and a dynamic, high-fidelity Swing UI (FlatLaf, MigLayout).

title: Musical Awards Management System
description: a highly modular C++ platform for event management, specializing in complex scheduling with strict conflict resolution, an atomic payment system (with a pending status and automated refunds), and real-time console visualization for monitoring attendance, sales, and venue seating capacity.

title: Personal Desktop Management Suite
description: a comprehensive Personal Desktop Management Suite using Python/Tkinter, seamlessly integrating three applications—an advanced Expense Tracker with visual analytics, a Reminder App featuring scheduled notifications and a dynamic clock, and a structured Note Organizer—all accessible via a fluid, animated main menu.

title: Airport Flight Network Routing System
description: a high-integrity, data-persistent flight network manager in Java, built around a core Map graph structure that supports full CRUD operations, and features a BFS-based shortest-path solver with reliable data serialization using Gson.
